https://goldenpalmresort.co.uk]]></text></topic><topic position="-325,0" order="1" id="3"><text><![CDATA[Everything here at our all action complex is tailored to make your
family holiday both enjoyable and memorable, you will want to
return again and again. The Golden Palm Resort has something for
everyone. In the mood for taking a dip? Our heated indoor fun pool
is great for family fun. Grab a bite to eat from our take away
outlets offering everything from Chicken Chapel and Chinese
cuisine to traditional Fish and Chips.

Treat the family to dinner out with our value for money menu at
JWâ€™s Bar and Grill. Try your luck in our hi-tech amusement arcade
or test your skills on our recently refurbished adventure golf.

By night, family entertainment takes place in the amazing Club
Tropicana with dazzling non stop shows from top star acts, our
talented resident entertainment team bring you live music and
laughter in the largest privately owned cabaret venue on the
Lincolnshire coast.]]></text></topic></topic></map>
